channel.title: Lillet Blanc on Need a drink?
channel.description: Recent content in Lillet Blanc on Need a drink?

item.title: Corpse reviver no. 2
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 20 ml gin
  • 20 ml triple sec
  • 20 ml Lillet Blanc
  • 20 ml lemon juice
  • 4 dashes absinthe
  • (garnish) cocktail cherry

Instructions

  1. (Optional) rinse glass with absinthe.
  2. Shake ingredients.
  3. Serve in a cocktail glass.
  4. Garnish with a cocktail cherry.
